publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2372 Stuart McMillan: Fair in the Squareâ€”That the Parliament recognises Fair in the Square, an event taking place on 23 August 2008 in County Square, Paisley, to celebrate the five year anniversary of Paisley becoming a Fairtrade town, and wishes all involved in Renfrewshire full support in leading the campaign to gain fairtrade county status. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Michael Matheson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-2372 Fair in the Square (lodged on 6 August 2008) Aileen Campbell*, Angela Constance*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2372Fair in the Square (lodged on 6 August 2008) Bill Wilson*
S3M-2372 Fair in the Square (lodged on 6 August 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2372 Fair in the Square (lodged on 6 August 2008) Keith Brown*
